label: Accreditation
comment: An official recognition awarded to a person, organisation or thing, such as a building or product, to certify that a certain level of attainment has been achieved.

datatypeProperties.comment: The date, time, date time or other date time value when this certified accreditation was obtained.
A code specifying an authentication method for this certified accreditation.
The name of the accrediting body, expressed as text, for this certified accreditation.

referencedBy.comment: A certified accreditation specific to this transport person.
